title: `internal compiler error: unexpected panic` when compiling `docopt` with nightly

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ``` env RUST_BACKTRACE=full cargo +nightly install -f -v cargo-outdated |& tee build.log ``` ### Meta `rustc +nightly --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.44.0-nightly (38114ff16 2020-03-21) binary: rustc commit-hash: 38114ff16e7856f98b2b4be7ab4cd29b38bed59a commit-date: 2020-03-21 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.44.0-nightly LLVM version: 9.0 ``` **It compiles correctly on *stable*** ---- `cat /etc/lsb-release` ``` DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu DISTRIB_RELEASE=20.04 DISTRIB_CODENAME=focal DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu Focal Fossa (development branch)" ``` ---- `CPU` (as I use `-C target-cpu=native`) - happens on multiple versions: * Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4771 CPU @ 3.50GHz * Intel(R) Xeon(R) Silver 4114 CPU @ 2.20GHz ### Error output Found in https://gist.github.com/p-kraszewski/c5d20e90dad884850d52585222fa54ad for its length
Backtrace

``` 0: 0x7f9d6fd6e8c4 - backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8ac7b6ec69387d92 at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.45/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:86 1: 0x7f9d6fd6e8c4 - backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h52e23d5def56c96d at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.45/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66 2: 0x7f9d6fd6e8c4 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h15ed2362e9ccd2a1 at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:78 3: 0x7f9d6fd6e8c4 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::h2be62896807550d2 at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62 7: 0x7f9d6fd736a5 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::hf7ae942ef2de419d at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49 8: 0x7f9d6fd736a5 - rustc_driver::report_ice::h330464f0598b6575 11: 0x7f9d6fd73e25 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h1fdc57c433270b4b at src/libstd/panicking.rs:515 12: 0x7f9d6fd7393b - rust_begin_unwind at src/libstd/panicking.rs:419 13: 0x7f9d6fda3d51 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::h27466b8f06c168c0 at src/libstd/sys/unix/thread.rs:80 36: 0x7f9d6fcb4609 - start_thread 37: 0x7f9d6fbc8153 - __clone 38: 0x0 - ``` Tail: ``` error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.44.0-nightly (38114ff16 2020-03-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 -C target-cpu=native --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [hir_owner] HIR owner of `regex` #1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `docopt`. ```
